snippet: The reason for the arrest of the cartoonist, Hadi Heidari, was not clear. It came amid a crackdown against perceived Western infiltration, activists said.
abstract: Iranian security agents arrest political cartoonist Hadi Heidari, who worked for paper owned by country's Red Crescent Society, without explanation
lead_paragraph: The reason for the arrest of the cartoonist, Hadi Heidari, was not clear. It came amid a crackdown against perceived Western infiltration, activists said.

headline.main: Prominent Iranian Cartoonist Reported Arrested in Tehran
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Iran: Newspaper Cartoonist Is Arrested

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies
